title: Complete AMS Digital Agency marketing-page content and legal/about sections

requirements.summary: Add About and Legal (Privacy/Terms/Cookies) in-page sections and ensure all nav/footer anchors resolve to readable content in the rendered layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the header "About" navigation scrolls to a visible About section with meaningful English copy (no placeholder/lorem ipsum).

Clicking footer legal links (Privacy Policy, Terms of Service, Cookie Policy) scrolls to corresponding sections that contain complete, readable policy text (headings + multi-paragraph content) in English.
There are no dead in-page links (no nav/footer link pointing to an id that does not exist in the DOM).

file_operations.description: Create an About section rendered as a real page section with id="about" (via SectionShell) containing meaningful, final English copy for AMS Digital Agency (who we are, what we do, differentiators, values).

Create legal policy sections containing complete readable English policy text: Privacy Policy (id="privacy"), Terms of Service (id="terms"), and Cookie Policy (id="cookies"). Ensure each policy is a distinct section with headings and multi-paragraph content.
Wire the new About and Legal sections into the existing single-page layout so the header/footer hash links (#about, #privacy, #terms, #cookies) resolve to elements present in the DOM.

requirements.summary: Rewrite and standardize all existing marketing-page copy to a consistent, professional AMS Digital Agency brand voice across header, sections, CTAs, and footer.
acceptanceCriteria: All visible text in HeroSection, ServicesSection, ProofSection, TestimonialsSection, ProcessSection, CtaSection, SiteHeader, and SiteFooter is coherent and consistently branded as AMS Digital Agency.
No section contains generic placeholder copy; all items in arrays (services, steps, metrics, testimonials, trust indicators, footer descriptions) read as intentional final content.
CTA form helper text, labels/placeholders, and button text remain clear and grammatical in English.

file_operations.description: Standardize header branding and navigation/CTA text to match the AMS Digital Agency voice; ensure the About nav item continues to target #about and user-facing strings are consistent and professional.
Rewrite hero headline/subheadline, trust indicators, stat labels, and CTA button text to consistent AMS Digital Agency marketing copy (final English, no generic placeholders).
Rewrite services section heading/intro plus each service title/description/features and card CTA text to consistent, final AMS Digital Agency copy.
Rewrite proof/metrics labels and descriptions to be specific, credible, and consistently branded for AMS Digital Agency.
Rewrite testimonials section heading/intro and testimonial names/roles/content as polished, intentional final copy aligned with AMS Digital Agency tone (avoid placeholder-style statements).
Rewrite process section heading/intro and each step title/description to consistent, professional AMS Digital Agency messaging.

Rewrite CTA heading/description, form placeholder/button text, helper text, and trust badges/labels to consistent AMS Digital Agency messaging while keeping the form semantics unchanged (no real submission integration).

Rewrite footer brand description, column headings/link labels (as needed), and any helper text to align with the standardized AMS Digital Agency voice while preserving existing in-page href targets (including #privacy/#terms/#cookies).
